fixes.name: Median Sales Price National
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau MEDIAN([Price]) to DAX MEDIAN over the specified table column.

fixes.name: Median Sales Price % Increase
fixes.dax_expression: ((MEDIAN('trulia_dataset_cleaned (trulia_dataset_cleanedTBL)'[Price]) - MEDIAN('trulia_dataset_cleaned (trulia_dataset_cleanedTBL)'[Last Sold For])) / MEDIAN('trulia_dataset_cleaned (trulia_dataset_cleanedTBL)'[Last Sold For])) * 100
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau expression using MEDIAN aggregations into DAX by applying MEDIAN to each referenced column and preserving the arithmetic percentage calculation.

fixes.name: County Drill Down
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the row-level Tableau IF [State Set] THEN [COUNTYNAME] END to a DAX IF that returns COUNTYNAME when State Set is true, otherwise BLANK(). This is row-level logic, so it is implemented as a calculated column.
